actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, Financial Services, the Judiciary, Veterans' Affairs, Ways and Means, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To promote and support the local arts and creative economy in the United States.

summary.text:
Promoting Local Arts and Creative Economy Workforce Act of 2022 or the PLACE Act

This bill establishes or modifies various programs that support opportunities for education or job training in a creative industry or occupation.

titles.title: Promoting Local Arts and Creative Economy Workforce Act of 2022
To promote and support the local arts and creative economy in the United States.
